main.heading: This website was built as a challenge, with two key ideas in mind: 'use only tools from the language standard library', and 'make it as minimal as possible'.
paragraphs: The first implementation uses python. You can read more about the python implementation on the python link above. You can see the repository on github via the github link above.
The site is also available in multiple Content-Types. You can request in HTML, plain text, or JSON format, using the Accept header.
